welcome_message_body: Welcome to Bitung, Indonesia! Get ready to experience the charm of this vibrant city, known for its beautiful beaches, rich marine life, and warm hospitality. Enjoy your stay and explore all that Bitung has to offer!

restaurants.name: Ikan Bakar " Mando Resto "
restaurants.description: Ikan Bakar " Mando Resto " is a seafood restaurant located in Bitung Tengah.
restaurants.address: Perempatan Tinombala (Pateten), Bitung Tengah, Sulawesi Utara

restaurants.description: Kawasan Wisata Kuliner Kota Tomohon is a food truck located in Tomohon.
restaurants.address: Jl. Pasar Lama (Paslaten Satu), Tomohon, Sulawesi Utara

restaurants.description: Ayam Penyet Ria is a indonesian restaurant located in Bitung.

restaurants.name: RM Ayam Goreng Mentega Swadaya
restaurants.description: RM Ayam Goreng Mentega Swadaya is a fried chicken joint located in Bitung.
